c74object.name: hoa.3d.vector~
c74object.digest: A 3d soundfield energy and velocity vectors calculator.
c74object.description: hoa.3d.vector~ computes the coordinates of the velocity vector and the energy vector that characterize a sound field. It's an useful tool to analyse restitution quality. For futher information : Michael A. Gerzon, General metatheorie of auditory localisation. Audio Engineering Society Preprint, 3306, 1992.

metadatalist.metadata: Julien Colafrancesco, Pierre Guillot, Eliott Paris.

objarg.name: number-of-channels
objarg.description: First argument sets the number of channels.

objarg.name: vector-type
objarg.description: second argument sets the type of vector to compute (energy or velocity)

attribute.name: angles
attribute.description: Set the angles of each channels in degrees. Each angles are in degrees, wrapped between 0. and 360. You must specify 2 values per channel corresponding to the azimuth value followed by the elevation value.
